title: Don’t Fear Speaking the Truth | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Allie Beth Stuckey | 8/6/21
description:
What’s actually to blame for the devastation of the American small business during the pandemic? The latest episode of the Glenn Beck Podcast with “recovering investment banker” Carol Roth has the answer. The Left will move into any state and destroy it. Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly review of the news: On this week’s lineup: N.Y. Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s sexual harassment scandal, the new jobs report, vaccine passports, and the controversial eviction moratorium. BlazeTV host Allie Beth Stuckey was thrown into Twitter jail for calling transgender weightlifter Laurel Hubbard a biological man. She joins to explain why she’s not backing down. The housing crisis is right in line with the Great Reset. It’s time to start boycotting.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
